channel.title: TV Development on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TV Development on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Nicole Kidman, Elle Fanning to Star in A24 Legal Thriller ‘Discretion’
item.description: Author Chandler Baker will adapt her short story and executive produce with the two stars and Susannah Grant.

item.title: Nicole Kidman, Elle Fanning to Star in A24 Legal Thriller ‘Discretion’
item.description: Author Chandler Baker will adapt her short story and executive produce with the two stars and Susannah Grant.

item.title: Outrage Spreads Over ‘Black-ish’ Creator’s Sitcom Set in Wildfire-Devastated L.A. Neighborhood
item.description: The Eaton fire in January killed at least 19 people and destroyed thousands of homes. As the Altadena area struggles to recover, many see a comedy set there to be in poor taste.

item.title: Outrage Spreads Over ‘Black-ish’ Creator’s Sitcom Set in Wildfire-Devastated L.A. Neighborhood
item.description: The Eaton fire in January killed at least 19 people and destroyed thousands of homes. As the Altadena area struggles to recover, many see a comedy set there to be in poor taste.

item.title: HBO Wins Bidding War for ‘Fort Bragg Cartel’ Book to Develop as Series
item.description: Former HBO Films head Len Amato and author Seth Harp are behind the project.

item.title: HBO Wins Bidding War for ‘Fort Bragg Cartel’ Book to Develop as Series

item.title: High School Mystery ‘Foster Dade’ From Bash Doran, Greg Berlanti Lands Hulu Pilot Order
item.description: The project is based on a novel by Nash Jenkins.

item.title: Vampire Comedy From ’Ghosts’ Showrunners Gets CBS Pilot Order
item.description: Joe Port and Joe Wiseman are writing the project, called ‘Eternally Yours.’
